description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Defend the nine worlds of the Camariam Consortium or play as the besieging Valaxus Empire with their planet obliterating Decimators.  Play across five different game play types, from local two player co-op campaigns, to multiple versus modes supporting 2-4 local players. Experience a new variation of the shooter genre.
